title: ID Card Template 5 Configuration Schema
description: Schema for configuring ID card template variables - Nova Institute dark gradient style

primaryColor.title: Primary Color
primaryColor.description: Primary dark color for card background gradient start

secondaryColor.title: Secondary Color
secondaryColor.description: Secondary color for card background gradient end

accentGradientStart.title: Accent Gradient Start
accentGradientStart.description: Start color for accent gradients (name pill, photo border)

accentGradientEnd.title: Accent Gradient End
accentGradientEnd.description: End color for accent gradients (name pill, photo border)

textColorForHeaderAndFooter.title: Text Color for Header and Footer
textColorForHeaderAndFooter.description: Text color used for header text and name pill

defaultTextColor.title: Default Text Color
defaultTextColor.description: Default text color used for main content values

defaultLabelColor.title: Default Label Color
defaultLabelColor.description: Default label color used for field labels

bloodGroupTextColor.title: Blood Group Text Color
bloodGroupTextColor.description: Text color specifically for blood group value

footerText.title: Footer Text
footerText.description: Footer text to be displayed at the bottom of the card

schoolLogoFileId.title: School Logo for ID Card
schoolLogoFileId.description: File ID for the school logo image displayed in the header
